rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {AAF4100, ACX4000, AFC4100%, AFX4000%}
Must be enrolled in course version {0171, 0181, 0503, 4416}
Must be enrolled in course version {0171, 0181, 4416}
Unit was previously coded {AAF4100, ACX4000, AFC4100%, AFX4000%}

description: Introduction to a broad range of research methodology and testing procedures used in accounting. The primary focus is on the undertaking of research. This unit comprises an analysis of the science of research, an examination of the key elements of research in accounting, data issues, ethical issues, hypothesis development, causal models, the use of parametric and non-parametric statistical tests, survey-based research and general research methodology. The unit also entails preparation of a research proposal in an area of accounting.
